A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: part one was interesting\, mysterious\, and engaging. This one... has confusing plot\, bad comedy\, and an over all failure. There's no storyline; although its an extra long movie... nothing makes sense. Its basically a bunch of missing unrelated scenes put together trying to create something... but ended up making nothing. This is the worst Star Wars movie so far. Complete failure. Because of this epic fail\, I have no interest in watching the next one.
